keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The report by the Human Rights Advisory Panel, part of the mission in Kosovo, contains extraordinarily strong language about, among other things, failures to investigate disappearances and killings....
lead_paragraph: The report by the Human Rights Advisory Panel, part of the mission in Kosovo, contains extraordinarily strong language about, among other things, failures to investigate disappearances and killings.
